roleset.name: (cause to) change shape or transform
roleset.note: MORPH-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick based on ebc, comparison to 'change'. See VNcls turn-26.6.1, (from morph.01-v)

example.name: with mnr
example.text: Now let me show you a bit of a new ad that the Lamont campaign is airing [which]-2 *T*-2 morphs Joe Leiberman wiht uh pictures of President Bush.
example.arg: which -> a new ad that the Lamont campaign is airing
with uh pictures of President Bush
